```{r, setup}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
```

## Read in some data

Read in the litters dataset.

Read in the litters dataset

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
litters_df = read_csv("./data/FAS_litters.csv")
litters_df = clean_names(litters_df)
```

## Takr a look at the data

printing in the console

```{r}
litters_df
```

```{r}
tail(litters_df)
```

```{r}
skimr::skim(litters_df)
```

##Opyions to read_csv

```{r}
litters_df = read_csv("./data/FAS_litters.csv")
```

check out '?read_csv()' for more info

## Other file formats

Read in an excel file.

```{r}
library(readxl)
mlb_df = read_excel("./data/mlb11.xlsx", range = "A1:F7")
mlb_df
```

Read i a SAS file.

what about 'read.csv' ...?
